remarks: Transfer an associative law to the function operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofref.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofref.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
caofcom.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofass.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
caofass.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x R y ) T z ) = ( x O ( y P z ) ) ) $.
caofass $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F oF R G ) oF T H ) = ( F oF O ( G oF P H ) ) ) $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d O x y z $.
$d P x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
